other_tests.findings: In the sigmoid colon, there is a region of wall thickening, stranding, and an inflamed diverticulum. There is a 2.2 x 1.5 cm irregular locule of free air in the mesentery adjacent to this region. The remainder of the colon shows scattered diverticulosis without evidence of other regions of concern. Degenerative changes noted at L5-S1 with disc space narrowing, endplate sclerosis, and a small disc bulge.
